ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISNULL( Actual_Release_Date__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Deployed - Other Issues') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Deployed Successfully') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Deployment Introduced Regression') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Partial Deployment - Halted') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Partial Deployment - Superseded') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Partial Rollback') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Redeployed After Rollback') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Rollback') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Deployed - Exceeded Release Window') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Deployed - Date Changed') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Actual Release Date is required if the release has been fully or partially deployed.
